text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The first race of the Classic Triple<n>Crown, the
Satsuki Sho, is about to start<n>when Fuji Kiseki
suddenly gets a phone<n>call.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She picks up to find herself greeted with<n>cheers
from her dorm residents. She<n>heads off for the
race, heart bolstered<n>by their sweet surprise.
